sentences: M.C. Brains (born James DeShannon Davis) is an American rapper from Cleveland, Ohio, United States.
Discovered by Michael Bivins of New Edition, Brains was signed to Motown Records, who issued his debut album Lovers Lane in 1992.
In 1996, M.C. Brains (under the name M.C. Brainz) released a second album entitled Brainwashed for Ichiban Records.
